author: Kynix @KynixXBT
text: Bullish: Tradfi in meltup mode, Tariffs paused, Rate cuts getting priced in, August post halving seasonality, Tcos max bidding, $Eth leading, New Moon, Golden Cross everywhere, BTC.d below 60%, RSI still not overheated, Sentiment still not greedy, 4 year cycle right on time.
